messages.message:
Hi everyone, there will be a brief period of downtime for Cloud Console prod today at 3:30pm EST while we rebuild some DB projections. This will only affect the sandbox manager page (https://console.instabase.com/sandbox) and should take no more than 15 minutes. All other pages (including the sandbox details pages) will still be available, so if there’s a sandbox you think you might need to access during this time I recommend that you bookmark its page or store the URL somewhere. This won’t have an effect on customers.

I’ll update this thread when maintenance starts and when it ends, thanks!
